bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
After upgrading the cinnamon packages, I noticed that the screen brightness control buttons do not work anymore. Looking at journalctl, I got:
May 19 22:06:42 lars csd-media-keys[1610]: Failed to get old screen percentage: GDBus.Error:org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.ServiceUnknown: The name org.cinnamon.SettingsDaemon was not provided by any .service files
After which I noticed that the cinnamon-settings-daemon did not run at all, which lead me to notice that there is an invalid symlink in /usr/bin/cinnamon-settings-daemon which might be the cause:
% ll /usr/bin/cinnamon-settings-daemon lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 37 May 8 21:45 /usr/bin/cinnamon-settings-daemon -> /usr/libexec/cinnamon-settings-daemon % ll /usr/libexec/cinnamon-settings-daemon ls: cannot access '/usr/libexec/cinnamon-settings-daemon': No such file or directory
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 3.4.0-1.fc25
*** Bug 1452877 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

(In reply to Lars Kiesow from comment #0) > Description of problem: > > After upgrading the cinnamon packages, I noticed that the screen brightness > control buttons do not work anymore. Looking at journalctl, I got: > > May 19 22:06:42 lars csd-media-keys[1610]: Failed to get old screen > percentage: GDBus.Error:org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.ServiceUnknown: The name > org.cinnamon.SettingsDaemon was not provided by any .service files >
Fixed by this update currently in testing repo
https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-9788d934f2
> After which I noticed that the cinnamon-settings-daemon did not run at all, > which lead me to notice that there is an invalid symlink in > /usr/bin/cinnamon-settings-daemon which might be the cause: > > % ll /usr/bin/cinnamon-settings-daemon > lrwxrwxrwx. 1 root root 37 May 8 21:45 /usr/bin/cinnamon-settings-daemon -> > /usr/libexec/cinnamon-settings-daemon > % ll /usr/libexec/cinnamon-settings-daemon > ls: cannot access '/usr/libexec/cinnamon-settings-daemon': No such file or > directory >
This was a harmless leftover, fixed in git
http://pkgs.fedoraproject.org/cgit/rpms/cinnamon-settings-daemon.git/commit/?id=cf444e07684a6cb257d1ad218a5cf6b0e973deed
*** Bug 1452909 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Thanks for fixing the issue! â€¦and sorry for double posting.
